name: Occult Survivor
description:
Occult Survivor is a 2D single-player survival game in the form of a Pixel Art-style Roguelite platformer.

    The gameplay is inspired by games like Vampire Survivors, Nomad Survival. Unlike the latter, the view is sideways in two dimensions and is designed as a platformer.

    The player can only move and must face waves of enemies with automatic attacks, bosses punctuate the game phases.

    The player recovers spells by emerging victorious from his fights with the bosses. Bosses randomly generate a new spell from a pool of items to help the player continue in the increasingly difficult game.

    The game ends when the player has defeated the final boss.

Credits : 

• Main caracter : Thomas Lean
• Development : Leo E.
• Other Pixel art : Roman M.
• Launcher : https://patchkit.net/
